subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: A second defendant has pleaded guilty in the beating death of the former Villanova basketball star Howard Porter, the most valuable player of the 1971 N.C.A.A. tournament. Rashad Raleigh, 29, pleaded guilty to first-degree murder in an agreement that called for him to be sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.
